name: tm50
effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Nightmare Gen I: Substitute)

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
